description:
Shiori is still being a brat that need taking down a notch.
Miki is still believing she is the store managers girlfriend, and thinks he feels guilty after having an affair with Shiori.
Yui is told the news that the store needs to downsize the staff, and she needs to be let go. She offers everything to still be allowed to work in the store. Shiori is then chosen as the staff member that needs to be let go. Later a "new" employee shows up…
Source: TMDB

titles.title: Esclave de son patron • Yui doit se vendre au plus offrant
Submissive Black-Hearted Slave Yui: Serving You Without Pants
従順腹黒隷奴・結衣~ご奉仕ノーパン品出し♥~
